original_text: And it came to pass, when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples, he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities.
korean_text: 예수께서 열두 제자에게 명하기를 마치시고 이에 그들의 여러 동네에서 가르치시며 전도하시려고 거기를 떠나 가시니라

sentences.original_text: when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 열두 제자에게 명령을 마치셨을 때,

sentences.original_text: to teach and to preach in their cities.
